title: Hpocipo Set of 4 Decorative Throw Pillow Covers 18x18 Inches, Colorful Lovely Bird Waterproof Cushion Covers, Perfect to Outdoor Patio Garden Farmhouse Decor
features: 【No Pillow Inserts】18x18 inch/ 45x45cm(Please allow 1-2cm measurement deviation). Package contains 4 pieces of pillow cover, the insert is not include.

【Waterproof Throw Pillow Covers 18x18】Made of water and oil resistant and stain resistant fabric. A premium polyester linen blend material, very sturdy and ideal for outdoor use. Soft and thick, great waterproof pillow covers for the whole spring and summer outdoor decor!

【Outdoor Pillow Covers 18x18】Various colorful oil painting effects of flowers and birds, these decorative pillow covers are great gift choices for spring and summer. Perfect for decorating patio furniture, porch swing, outside bench, deck, backyard, living room, bedroom, couch, sofa and etc. Also easy to match with other patio decor.

【Outdoor Throw Pillows for Patio Furniture】The colors are vibrant, only one side is printed with a vivid pattern, and the other side is beige. These cute designs are a great addition to your outdoor patio set.
【Wash and Care】Hand wash or machine wash in cold water separately. Gently cycle only and don't bleach, tumble dry. Do not iron. After washing, it will not fade or wrinkle.
